name: node-hangman
description: 1. Enter the folder where the game files are stored on the computer 2. Input the command to pull up the game "Node index.js" 3. Follow the directions and input a letter 4. Continue to follow the prompts for a letter until you've completed the word, or you've run out of guesses 5. If you've won- celebrate a job well done. 6. If you lost- no big deal, it's just a game! 7. To play again select yes, if you don't, select no.
